item.title: Departure Course
item.description: This will be a short course or Reminder on how to create and manage Departure Notices. If you have any Questions after this please feel free to message your Commanding Officer and if they are not reachable the Person above them.

item.title: rules
item.description: Misc Rules Rules about pinging people BG-01 "Mind" Never ping something above you, like platoon company etc etc If ur SL You can ping platoon and below Only ur platoon If ...

item.title: How to Contribute
item.description: How to set up Obsidian and Git to Contribute to the wiki.

item.title: Advanced Movement Mech.
item.description: Movement Speeds Depending on the situation, the team might be required to move at different speeds in order to move effectively as a unit. It could be used to slow down to let others catch up while still maintaining movement at all times to avoid being vulnerable, or to speed up to catch up with others or to approach an objective much faster.

item.title: Communications Fundamentals
item.description: Situation Reports When someone requests a Situation Report or Sit-Rep, they want to know how the situation is going or being handled. Even if you have not reached a certain objective yet, your superiors still want a clear image about what your plan is to move to an objective.
